name: eXPimenttk (e-SecureOffice)
short_description:
1. project name eXPimenttk (e-SecureOffice)
2.Language Java (req. - at least j2re)
3.target platform - Cross-platform software
4.problem we want to sole- Encryption, Decryption software, File eraser, Messenger, Mailer,Remailer,FireWall
5 target - user
